old:
堅苦しいことは嫌いでね
なんでこの任務に呼ばれたんだろう
column2:
I don't like to do anything too formal.
I don't know why I was called for this assignment.
speaker: Liberation Army Soldier

old: そろそろ一息つきたいもんだ
column2: I'd like to take a break soon.
speaker: Liberation Army Soldier

old:
覚者さんも疲れたら
ちょっと休みなよ
column2: When you're tired, Master Arisen; Take a little break.
speaker: Liberation Army Soldier
